## Targets

```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

### Targets file

The targets file is at 

```{r}
url <- "https://renc.osn.xsede.org/bio230121-bucket01/vera4cast/targets/duration=P1D/P1D-targets.csv.gz"
```

```{r}
targets <- read_csv(url, show_col_types = FALSE)
```

```{r}
glimpse(targets)
```

### Variable list 

```{r}
targets |> distinct(variable, duration)
```
